special_text:
Ertys, Arbiter of the Cosmos is all colors.
[+1]: Create a token that's a copy of up to one target creature you control, except it's an enchantment. [i](It's not a creature.)[/i]
[-2]: Exile a nonland card from your graveyard and put three time counters on it. That card gains suspend.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.”
